title: Surat Municipal Corporation Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 06 Technical Assistant Posts
description: The Surat Municipal Corporation has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 06 Technical Assistant and Lab Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech, M.E./M. Tech, B.Sc., can apply for the Surat Municipal Corporation Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in online mode. Here we have mentioned the education deta...
